text: Got a hairwash & butterfly haircut here for only RM99. Great price with great services. Their team is nice, the lady gave head massage while washing my hair. Strong lady. Another person is tall man also very helpful explaining before doing my hair. Would definitely come here again.  Can improve greeting the customer at the door. Price and results is beyond my expectations ‚ù§Ô∏è

I went to salon did haircut and did scalp treatment for my friend. Michael style director gave lots of ideas and did a great job for us. He and his colleagues were very patience and did a very great satisfactory job. So satisfied to go for a great changeover. üëè

I would highly recommend people to try this place. The service there was amazing! Michael was very patient and helpful with my inquiries. It is a friendly environment! They gave me advices on how to take care of my hair colour. Additionally they provide snacks and drink for you. I would definitely come here again!

Thank you so much Michael!!!! We had awesome outcome and day with you at the salon. We loved the color you choose for us‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§
Michael was our fav hairstylist since we were in our 20s. We are so grateful to have found him once again! Will be coming here from now on. See u next month!

Did permanent hair perm at end and rebonding on top(RM500+)...didnt feel satisfy after done...the person say my hair was not layer so cant see the perm(should suggest to cut layer as professional)...I.was ask to come next week to redo ....but I didnt go...as I not very confident about their skill and scared my hair will get damaged...
